name: TheWorkplaceMinutepoweredbyH3HRAdvisors
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The latest news in the world of work and the workplace, powered by Steve Boese and Trish McFarlane from H3 HR Advisors. We cover the changing world of work, innovation in workplace technology, the macro labor marker, trends in employee experience and engagement, the role of technology in driving work and business transformation and much more. Brought to you by H3 HR Advisors' Steve Boese and Trish McFarlane, hosts of the popular HR Happy Hour Podcast and the HR Happy Hour WORK BREAK video series.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
